#Set Minimum Required CMake version
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.27.0)

#Set Compile Path
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "D:/msys64/ucrt64/bin/g++.exe")
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "D:/msys64/ucrt64/bin/gcc.exe")

#Set the Project Name and Version
project(OOP VERSION 1.0)

#Set the Output Path, relative to the directory where makefile generated by CMake locate
set(EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ../bin)

#Search the files 
file(GLOB_RECURSE SRC ./src/*.cpp)
# list(REMOVE_ITEM SRC ./src/tree.cpp)

#Set the Include Path
include_directories(./include)

#Addd the executable
add_executable(complex ${SRC})
